Code 01 - Lace Girls Socks

3-5 Years

  • Cotton blend

Product Description

Code 01 Lace Girls Socks are designed for girls aged 3-5 years, featuring elegant and comfortable design. The lace details provide a graceful look for both special occasions and daily wear.

Key Features

  • Lace Detail: Elegant and stylish design
  • Cotton Blend: Comfortable and breathable
  • Flexible Structure: Does not restrict movement
  • Color Options: White, pink, lilac, and more

Usage Areas

  • Ideal for school
  • Special occasions and parties
  • Daily elegant combinations
  • Perfect birthday gift

Care Instructions

  • Machine washable at 30°C
  • Delicate cycle recommended for lace details
  • Lay flat to dry

Wholesale Benefits: Contact us for color and size options. Mixed orders are available.

Since 2017, we have been producing and wholesaling quality socks in Istanbul Giyimkent.
